# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(ITAPS_C)

INCLUDE(${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMake/PluginMacros.cmake)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
ITAPS_CPluginInfo.C
ITAPS_CCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
ITAPS_CPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
ITAPS_CMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtITAPS_CFileFormat.C
avtITAPS_CUtility.C
avtITAPS_CWriter.C
avtITAPS_COptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
ITAPS_CEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtITAPS_CFileFormat.C
avtITAPS_CUtility.C
avtITAPS_CWriter.C
avtITAPS_COptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${ITAPS_C_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${EAVL_INCLUDE_DIR} 
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
)

ADD_DEFINITIONS("-DITAPS_C")

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${EAVL_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} ${ITAPS_C_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IITAPS_CDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IITAPS_CDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IITAPS_CDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MITAPS_CDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MITAPS_CDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${ITAPS_C_LIB} vtkFiltersGeneral )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MITAPS_CDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MITAPS_CDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EITAPS_CDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EITAPS_CDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser ${ITAPS_C_LIB} vtkFiltersGeneral )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EITAPS_CDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EITAPS_CDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EITAPS_CDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EITAPS_CDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par ${ITAPS_C_LIB} vtkFiltersGeneral )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EITAPS_CDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EITAPS_CDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases ITAPS_C ${INSTALLTARGETS})
